thread.title: Is Drew Barrymore`s nightgown-esque dress making a comeback?
thread.title_full: Is Drew Barrymore`s nightgown-esque dress making a comeback?

author: NewsWire
title: Is Drew Barrymore`s nightgown-esque dress making a comeback?
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Washington D.C., Oct. 5(ANI): Not only the chokers and Doc Martens have made a comeback for the 90’s era but there is something else that is taking over the tinsel town again. the nightgown dress. 
The Long silky dresses, often trimmed in lace that were popularised by the edgiest celebs, such as Drew Barrymore, Courtney Love and Kate Moss, are making a comeback after twenty years, reports the Glamour. 
The designers are now using this always in fashion trend in their collections, be it the New York runways or the Paris catwalks nightgown dresses can be seen everywhere. 
Popular brands such as Calvin Klein, Balenciaga and Celine are also using nightgown dresses in their fashion line . (ANI) Related Posts
